messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a sales company. Amir is the CEO of the company and has two senior managers under him: Wim and Raj. Wim has two salespersons reporting to him: Jing and Wei. Raj has two salespersons reporting to him: Nisha and Reza. Jing is donating 56 books and Wei is donating 22 books. Nisha is donating 10 books and Reza is donating 50 books. Assume you can pick one path to collect books.  From Amir, who should you meet with to get the maximum number of books? Please list the names in order, including Amir, separated by commas

To collect the maximum number of books from the company, it is best to meet with Wim and Raj first, as they are senior managers and can collect the most books from their salespersons. However, since Wim has two salespersons, it is best to meet with Wim first to collect the most books. Then, meet with Raj to collect the most books from him. Next, meet with Jing and Wei to collect their books, as they are the salespersons reporting to Wim. Then, meet with Nisha and Reza to collect their books, as they are the salespersons reporting to Raj. Finally, meet with Amir to collect the books he is donating. Here is the list of names in order, including Amir, separated by commas:
- Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, Reza, Amir

Amir now has a portal, and through this portal itâ€™s possible to meet with any of Wimâ€™s direct reports. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the maximum number of books. Starting from Amir, who should you meet with to get the maximum number of books? Please list the names in order, including Amir, separated by commas..

If I were to meet with only one person to collect the maximum number of books, I would meet with Wim, as he is the direct manager of two sales persons. If I were to meet with Wim, I would ask him to collect the most books from his direct reports, Jing and Wei. However, since Wim has two direct reports, I would ask him to collect the most books from Jing.
